Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Morgan
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Racine, 51st, Halsted and 47th due to localized flooding near 47th/Morgan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Racine, 51st, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 47th due to localized flooding near 47th/Morgan.

Allow extra travel time.
